abilities.name: Delta Protection
abilities.text: Any damage done to Dewgong by attacks from your opponent's Pokémon that has δ on its card is reduced by 40 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Ice Beam
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Surge
attacks.text: If Dewgong has at least 2 Water Energy attached to it, this attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage.
